metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11082 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Kaminari before 1.2.1, there is a vulnerability that would allow an attacker to inject arbitrary code into pages with pagination links. This has been fixed in 1.2.1.

criterions.comment: ruby-kaminari: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
